channel.title: New to editing other bases than Delta, HELP!
channel.description:
Guys, where is the java file where you edit the texts in-game like the ones in the quest-tab "Owner: Bla Bla" etc... It was usually named texthandler.java in Delta sources, i'm new to these bases how would you edit all those texts? What's the name of the JAVA-File?
I wanna know how the edit some stuff in the game like what the tabs says in the Quest-tab or like add commands and stuff, how do i do that? The server i'm currently looking at is this one located over here http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,478718.0.html
Server Base: Alison317

@sk8rdude461 wrote:

im not a delta person, have no clue. sorry mate

Read full topic

item.description:

rsinterface class, client sided for interfaces like bank etc.

And Client class for the rest, i think
